event.title: launched a new national vaccination program yesterday

data.event: Eritrea officially launched a new national vaccination program yesterday to protect children against deadly polio.
The program will take place in two rounds, the first of which runs from Monday till Wednesday this week and the second is planned for May 13-15.

event.title: Wednesday this week and the second is planned

data.event: The program will take place in two rounds, the first of which runs from Monday till Wednesday this week and the second is planned for May 13-15.
UNICEF says that Africa accounts for 75 percent of polio cases reported worldwide so far in 2005.
